text.data: Frederica: Hey. Aren't [character][0x0] and the others back yet?[end]
Hornet: Sorry to make you wait! We brought your leader back. Captain Sendak is with us too.[end]
Diana: [character][0x0]'s here!![end]
Frederica: [character][0x0]!! We've been waiting for you![end]
Diana: We were getting worried since you were late.[end]
Hornet: There will be time to chat later! Now our struggle begins.[end]
Hornet: Okay, Captain Sendak! Give the order for departure![end]
Hornet: That's right! I forgot! You decided on a name for the ship, didn't you?[end]
Sendak: The name of the ship is...[end]
Matelite: Wait! You're forgetting about me! What is the meaning of this?![end]
Taicho: Matelite! Wait![end]
Hornet: Hey! Be quiet inside the ship![end]
Matelite: Just who do you think I am?! You're talking to me, Matelite![end]
Hornet: Okay, Captain Sendak. Now for the ship's name.[end]
Sendak: Ahem! Okay, get ready now...[end]
[character][0x9], the flagship of Kahna!![end]
Taicho: The flagship of Kahna!? But something seems missing![end]
Matelite: Taicho... You know what to do...[end]
Taicho: T-this is...! Sir Matelite!![end]
Taicho: As you wish, Sir Matelite! Here I go![end]
Taicho: Here I go!![end]
Taicho: Sir Matelite!! Look!![end]
Oh!! Kahna's flag![end]

Matelite: Our kingdom of Kahna... [character][0x1]... Master Sendak! [character][0x0]!! Someday... We will hang many more flags up here!!
Taicho!! The day when we hang the flag of your kingdom of Mahal will come without fail! We are fighting for that day! The battle has just begun!
I am Matelite![end][end]
